events.message: The customer reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle on a busy intersection, requesting immediate assistance.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle collision and damage reported by the customer.
An insurance agent specialized in vehicle damages was assigned to the case to help facilitate the investigation and customer support.
The insurance company has officially acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that the process will begin shortly.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and the customerâ€™s driving license to proceed with the claim evaluation.
The customer submitted all required documents including photos of the car damage and the official police report detailing the accident.
The claims department has begun an investigation by reviewing the submitted documentation and contacting witnesses.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the customer was not at fault and all damages were verified.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repair costs and rental car expenses has been proposed to the customer.
The customer provided positive feedback appreciating the quick response and the fair settlement offer.
The claim was formally approved by the insurance company based on the investigation and agreement on the settlement.
Payment was issued to cover the damages and related costs, ensuring the customer can proceed with vehicle repairs immediately.
The insurance claim has been successfully closed after full payment and confirmation from the customer that repairs are underway.
